Game.join: Joins the current mafia party! First player join wil be party leader.
Game.leave: Leaves the current mafia party. Cannot do so while a game is setting or playing.
Game.remove @user: Kicks a player off the party (Must be party leader)
Game.setup: Sets up a game of mafia with the current party on the server (Minimum players is 5). Each player will receive a dm from a bot about their role. (Must be party leader)
Game.start: Starts the mafia game (Must do m.setup first!) (Must be party leader)
Game.stop: Stops the current mafia game after the current round.
Game.reset: Resets the variables on the server (ONLY DO THIS IF MAFIABOT IS BUGGED OUT)

Settings.gamemode: Shows info about each game mode!
Settings.setting: Shows the current adjustable settings on the server
Settings.custom: Customize the settings on the server. Ex. m.custom dmTime 30 or m.custom gamemode crazy

Help.info: Reveals bot's info (like a link to the Mafiabot Support Server!)
Help.perms: Shows the required perms for Mafiabot to function most of the time
Help.roles `role`: Show the information about a specific role
Help.game: Shows information about the game of Mafia!
Help.support: Gives a link to the Official Mafiabot Support Sever! I heard it's pretty fun there.

Mini Games.mini: Shows all the mini games Mafiabot can play!
Mini Games.duel: Challenges another player to a duel. Each turn players choose their attack and determines who wins. Last man standing wins. Ex. m.duel @linkboi
Mini Games.slot (bet): Plays a slot machine! Bet a certain number (default is 10 and must be at least 10). Type m.slotInfo to view more!

Economy.record @user: Shows the past games played and the amount of Mafia points!
Economy.transfer @user (amount): Transfers an certain amount of mafia points from your account to the target's account
Economy.buy: Buys item from the shop by selecting items associated with its number!
Economy.titles: Shows a list of titles owned by you! (Buy titles from the shop!)
Economy.setTitle: Equips a title you own by selecting one associated with its number!
